nodes.text: The Tide of Progress XII was one of the InterGalactic Banking Clan's Munificent-class star frigates.
It hailed from a secret Banking Clan treasury space station located halfway between the galaxy and its closest dwarf satellite galaxy.

During the Clone Wars, this vessel served in the Confederate Navy. It was damaged during the Battle of Crombach Nebula when Jedi Master Wom-Nii Gnaden crashed his NTB-630 naval bomber into it. The damage was still visible when Tide of Progress XII fought at the Battle of Coruscant during the final days of the Clone Wars.
